Class Invoice

java.lang.Object
AppointmentManagement.Invoice
public class Invoice extends Object
Represents an invoice for a patient's appointment, including consultation fees, medicines, and total cost.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Invoice(String appointmentID, int patientID, double consultationFee)
    Constructs an Invoice object with the specified appointment ID, patient ID, and consultation fee.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    void
    addMedicine(String medicineName, int quantity, double pricePerUnit)
    Adds a medicine to the invoice with its name, quantity, and price per unit.

    calculateTotalAmount()
    Calculates the total amount for the invoice, including consultation fees and medicines.
    void
    displayInvoice()
    Displays the invoice details, including consultation fee, medicines, and total amount.

    getInvoiceDetails()
    Retrieves the invoice details as a string formatted for storage or file writing.

    Retrieves the total amount of the invoice.

  • Constructor Details

    • Invoice

      public Invoice(String appointmentID, int patientID, double consultationFee)
      Constructs an Invoice object with the specified appointment ID, patient ID, and consultation fee.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the associated appointment.
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      consultationFee - The fee charged for the consultation.

  • Method Details

    • addMedicine

      public void addMedicine(String medicineName, int quantity, double pricePerUnit)
      Adds a medicine to the invoice with its name, quantity, and price per unit.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine.
      quantity - The quantity of the medicine.
      pricePerUnit - The price per unit of the medicine.

    • calculateTotalAmount

      public void calculateTotalAmount()
      Calculates the total amount for the invoice, including consultation fees and medicines.

    • getTotalAmount

      public double getTotalAmount()
      Retrieves the total amount of the invoice.
      Returns:
      The total amount of the invoice.

    • displayInvoice

      public void displayInvoice()
      Displays the invoice details, including consultation fee, medicines, and total amount.

    • getInvoiceDetails

      public String getInvoiceDetails()
      Retrieves the invoice details as a string formatted for storage or file writing.
      Returns:
      A string containing the invoice details.
